meanings.definition: Enzymes found in pineapple juice that break down proteins.
meanings.sent1: The bromelins in pineapple juice help to break down proteins.
meanings.sent2: I learned that bromelins in pineapple juice can break down proteins.
meanings.sent3: The bromelins in the pineapple juice were like tiny helpers breaking down the proteins.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like bromelins, breaking down the barriers between us.
meanings.sent5: The bromelins worked tirelessly, breaking down the tough proteins into smaller pieces.

meanings.definition: A group of enzymes that aid in digestion.
meanings.sent1: These bromelins are important for digestion.
meanings.sent2: The group of bromelins in our stomach helps with digestion.
meanings.sent3: The bromelins in my tummy were having a party, aiding in digestion.
meanings.sent4: His kindness acted like bromelins, aiding in the digestion of my worries.
meanings.sent5: The bromelins worked together harmoniously, aiding in the smooth digestion process.

meanings.sent1: I read about the proteolytic bromelins derived from pineapples.
meanings.sent2: The bromelins, derived from pineapples, are proteolytic enzymes.
meanings.sent3: The proteolytic bromelins from pineapples were like little pineapple warriors.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the proteolytic bromelins derived from pineapples.
meanings.sent5: The proteolytic bromelins derived from pineapples worked efficiently to break down proteins.
